name: Ghost Town Gunner
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Aim with mouse and bounce the bullet off surfaces
  • Shoot with left/right mouse button to fire the bullet
  • Teleport with left/right mouse button
  • Dodge the bullets and kill the skeletons (again)

~

They call it a ghost town for a reason. 

Just a quick stop, in and out before carrying on. Our cowboy wasn’t looking for trouble. But, finding that revolver was fate. After finding a strange revolver in that abandoned town, our cowboy has awoken a spirit from within. A spirit explaining the power that that gun holds. 

The cursed revolver transports its wielder from one location to another by magic. By the spirit's power, it’s the only way our cowboy can move. With dangerous creatures in this town, our cowboy has no choice but to work alongside this ghost. He must rid this ghost town of his adversaries and escape or face entrapment with his ghost companion for all eternity.
